Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: pinkwoodb
Reviews.Content: it was everything my daughter needed to be able to feel like a teen.. it came on time and was exactly like described.

Reviews.Title: Volume Problems
Reviews.Author: Ellen Prudenti
Reviews.Content: No adjustments work to make the volume of calls received or sent satisfactory.  I knew I was taking a chance buying an old flip top, but I loved the model so much I wanted to try out a reconditioned one.  I don't feel abused--it was cheap--but I am notl satisfied either.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Verizon LG VX6000 CDMA Camera Flip Silver Cell Phone
